channel.title: Restoring old godswords
channel.description:
Hello there :)
On my server I have spent quite some time fixing up bugs and adding content and now I have decided to fix items, I am able to add items like max cape/comp cape etc.. But I am having problems restoring the old godswords. The current godswords that I have are [img]http://i.gyazo.com/ce4893da340c8feba41a462b88eff9f9.png[/img]
Would love and appreciate any help :)
Thank you!

item.title: Restoring old godswords
item.dc:creator: @doleo doleo
item.description:
@doleo wrote:

Oh wow haha thanks, i feel like an idiot

was trying to find the old godsword models to add them in like new godsword to never think that they pre existed.

Just deleted the models/id’s of new godswords and it worked

Thanks man! <3

Read full topic

item.title: Restoring old godswords
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Remove the new models and pack in the old models.

You need to find their model ID’s (I wrote a tutorial how to dump item data client sided AGES ago… look in the private server client hacking section) and then pack the old ones over the new (Technically, if the ids are the same, you don’t need to find them).

If you are preloading models (Using a “Raw” or “Models” folder) to load the new models, just remove the model ids from the folder and remove the ints from your ItemDef if they exist.

Read full topic
